member.summary: The full directory path of the target project. A copy of $(MSBuildProjectDirectory).

member.summary: The full file path of the target project. A copy of $(MSBuildProjectFullPath).

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.DocumentationFilePath
member.summary: The full directory path of the XML documentation file, if generating the documentation file is enabled in the project. A copy of @(DocFileItem->'%(FullPath)').

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.AddinDirectoryPath
member.summary: The full directory path of the current weaver.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.SolutionDirectoryPath
member.summary: The full directory path of the current solution. A copy of `$(SolutionDir)` or, if it does not exist, a copy of `$(MSBuildProjectDirectory)..\..\..\`. OPTIONAL

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.References
member.summary: A semicolon delimited string that contains all the references for the target project. A copy of the contents of the @(ReferencePath).

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.ReferenceCopyLocalPaths
member.summary: A list of all the references marked as copy-local. A copy of the contents of the @(ReferenceCopyLocalPaths).
member.remarks: This list will be actively synced back to the build system, i.e. adding or removing items from this list will modify the @(ReferenceCopyLocalPaths) list of the current build.

member.name: P:Fody.BaseModuleWeaver.DefineConstants
member.summary: A list of all the msbuild constants. A copy of the contents of the $(DefineConstants).
